item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 27, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Plasticlist Report – Data on plastic chemicals in Bay Area foods (117 points | 34 comments)
2. Scale Model of Boeing 777-300ER, Made from Manila Folders (362 points | 60 comments)
3. Should more of us be moving to live near friends? (63 points | 14 comments)
4. Show HN: Minimal, self-hosted exercise tracker (10 points | 1 comment)
5. DivestOS ROM shuts after ten years (56 points | 33 comments)
6. Show HN: I made a web app to bring children's drawings to life (62 points | 25 comments)
7. The hydraulic systems of the Alhambra Palace [video] (21 points | discuss)
8. Phugoid (7 points | 1 comment)
9. Spotify is full of AI music (14 points | 1 comment)
10. 1584 LAN party photos from 1996 – 2010 from Australia's island state archived (34 points | 9 comments)
11. Show HN: NeatShift – Organize Windows files with symbolic links (10 points | 5 comments)
12. Taxi drivers offer a clue to Alzheimer's risk (61 points | 56 comments)
13. They have not been trained for this (372 points | 46 comments)
14. Complain and Propose (2014) (64 points | 24 comments)
15. Programming Lewis Carroll's Memoria Technica (13 points | discuss)
16. Show HN: I send myself automated emails to practice Dutch (129 points | 85 comments)
17. Show HN: Instantly visualize any codebase as an interactive diagram (105 points | 46 comments)
18. VW breach exposes location of 800k electric vehicles (79 points | 90 comments)
19. Show HN: Houseplant – Database Migrations for ClickHouse (27 points | 6 comments)
20. J G A Pocock's "Machiavellian Moment" (31 points | 74 comments)
21. The new science of controlling lucid dreams (75 points | 75 comments)
22. Pseudonymity in Academic Publishing (12 points | 2 comments)
23. Fatty acid amides present in Camembert cheese improved cognitive decline (7 points | 3 comments)
24. The paper passport's days are numbered (19 points | 47 comments)
25. ChatGPT Saved Chats: Save and organize your important conversations in ChatGPT (40 points | 38 comments)
26. Harper (YC W25) Is Hiring Founding Engineer #2 ( | hide)
27. Demystifying Common Microcontroller Debug Protocols [video] (4 points | discuss)
28. Does current AI represent a dead end? (455 points | 847 comments)
29. Breaking the Mirror – A Look at Apple's New iPhone Remote Control Feature [video] (4 points | discuss)
30. Notice of Service Closure (157 points | 158 comments)
